transportation.translation[0].definition: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another
The city needs to improve its public transportation (=buses, trains etc).
People need to get out of their cars and use other modes of transportation.
the process or business of taking goods from one place to another
the transportation of dangerous chemicals by road
the punishment of sending a criminal to a distant country, especially Australia, in the past
transportation.translation[1].definition: the process or business of moving goods from one place to another by rail, air, ship etc
a system for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another
Passengers who want information about alternate forms of transportation can call the information helpdesk.
